author: MisterE
long_description:
This mod allows you to create schematics with goxel.

Download Goxel: https://goxel.xyz/download/

First, you need to create a palette for your world that maps colors to nodes.

Create a world, enable the mod, and send /save_palette

Locate the .gpl palette in the the newly created `/worlds/<world_name>/goxel_tools/world_name.gpl`

copy the palette to the goxel palettes folder (open Goxel, Edit > Settings > Paths, it will show you your palettes path)

Restart goxel

In Goxel, go to Palette and select the drop down to find your world_name palette. Node names are arranged alphabetically. 

Build your model.

When done, select File > Export > text

Save the text file to the world folder into goxel_tools

Open Luanti to your world, and run `/place_goxel file_name` or `/place_goxel file_name X Y Z`
(not `/place_goxel file_name.txt`) to place the model.
name: goxel_tools
short_description: Allows using goxel to create Luanti builds. Saves a palette of node colors for import into Goxel and allows importing Goxel models made using said palette.
title: Goxel Tools
